summary: The Boeing 757 is an American passenger airplane. It was designed to replace the older 727 model. The first flight was in 1982, and it started flying passengers in 1983. The 757 has two main versions: the 757-200 and the longer 757-300. It can carry between 200 and 243 passengers, depending on the version. This plane is used for short and medium-length flights, and some have been turned into cargo planes. As of 2017, Delta Air Lines had the most 757s in its fleet. Production ended in 2004, but many still fly today.
title: Boeing 757
